website_summaries.verdict: This double set of car escape tools makes a great stocking stuffer or a very useful party gift for a low price.
pros: Compact and lightweight plastic construction, with dual steel hammer heads
Mounting kit included, but it can also be stored loose
Sold as a double set for multiple vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: It may have broken a window - but I was not by any means confident in it. Sold as a pair - one of mine arrived with no razor blade. I thought that maybe it would be inside the tool so I opened it up to check. I found no razor blade, but discovered how thin the material is the handle is made from. I boxed everything back up and returned, I don't want to potentially risk a life with something that
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing a horrible wreck on the interstate. The car flipped over and the doors were locked so I was unable to open them. I didn't have anything to break the windows out to try to get the people out. Luckily a passing motorist had s crowbar. So glad I made the purchase!!! I saw a car hit a truck head on and then it flipped over. In order to check on him and I used this tool to break the window out. Once on scene a Paramedic actually used it to break the back window and cut the seatbelt off of the driver. Everyone should have this!
customer_reviews.author: We Be Shopping

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the 2-in-1 tool
customer_reviews.text: The tool will do the job it is intended to do. I tested the cutter on stiff strap to be sure. The "mount" is questionable. You can hold the mount, and shake the tool right out. There's no way I'd trust this to retain the tool in the case of an accident. I wouldn't use the mount for anything, without adding a velcro retaining strap. I still give the tool five stars, as the tool is worth the price, even it it came with no mount.
customer_reviews.author: whatever

customer_reviews.title: Plastic mount needs modifying
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully, we'll never have to use it. However, my only complaint is that the plastic mount or holder can only be mounted using screws. I certainly won't be drilling into my car to mount this. It needs to have more surface area on the back of it so it can be Velcro'd to a surface. I don't want to keep it in the glove box. If you are overturned, you may not be able to reach it. Otherwise, it seems to be of sturdy construction and I'm sure it'll work when needed
customer_reviews.author: Scott E

customer_reviews.title: Get piece of mind for a few bucks
customer_reviews.text: They work, I tested the cutter on some compression straps that were worn from camping. And the glass breakers were tested on bottles. The color is great, so you can see it at night but the holder is a little cheesy. Hardest part is to figure where to possibly mount it. Great that it comes in a two pack, one for each vehicle. But I will buy for the home too, for fire prep if the window is the only way out. Better than using an elbow, funny how the movies make it look easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel to it. Broke some spare glass I had with no effort on my part. Cut through some spare seatbelt material in no time. The feel and weight fits in hand perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Don't have one? Don't wait.
customer_reviews.text: Razor is super sharp. Hammer seems solid. The body is made out of plastic. So it is lightweight. But the plastic does not appear to be poor quality. They come individually packaged, so get one for yourself and you have an easy gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Tilikum

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Escape Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Every car should have one of these items, and while I didn't need a two pack, I gave them to two important people in my life for their protection should their vehicle ever go off the road into a body of water, or roll over or be in a fire in the vehicle and need to exit fast. These will break a safety glass window under water or in an emergency and has a seat belt cutter if needed, so almost any car incident where the power windos don't work or the seat belts are jammed, this tool can be a lifesaver! If your loved ones don't have one of these, get them one, and one for your car too!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of mind. Fits in the center console.
customer_reviews.text: These give me piece of mind, and that alone is worth it. One of my many irrational fears is that I will crash into a body of water and be trapped in my seatbelt with no way to roll the window down. I pray to every god every invented that the day I have to use these in an emergency situation never comes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had these in my truck for a while now. I decided to try them out on a removed door glass from an old car we had a while back. Test failed. We tried many different angles and such. It just didn't work as expected for us. Currently searching for a different model or solution. I'll update with pictures when I get back to the farm and see the glass again.
customer_reviews.author: mlazareno

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product came as it said it would. Easy too mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every car should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Every car should have one of these window break and seat belt cutter and now since this product is out and so in expensive, this should be a must have and fits easily inside the door pocket. I think this is much better than the ones that go on your keys. To use the one that goes on your keys you would have to take your keys out of the ignition. With this hammer it's right next to you. Better to be safe than sorry and never use it.
customer_reviews.author: KSL

customer_reviews.title: A vehicle safety product that all vehicles need.
customer_reviews.text: A good product that needs to be in every vehicle. Hopefully, you will never need to use it, but it is an extremely valuable tool in times of emergency. You can use it to break glass, which you can't usually can't break using your elbow or feet, like seen in movies. Second is the ability to cut through seat belts. Many seatbelts malfunction in an accident. The often lock in place and you need to be able to cut them to get out. This tool is great for that. I'm considering giving these as presents in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: grahamel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great safety item for your car. Includes a mounting bracket if you want to mount it somewhere inside your car. While I haven't had a need to use it, the design seems very sound. The handle is a nice ergonomic design. The handle is a solid plastic, that I hope does not get brittle over time. Some more rubber in the handle would have given me a little more confidence in that. A pop up pin at the top, to shatter glass, would have been a nice addition if you don't have space or arm strength to swing hammer.
customer_reviews.author: srf

customer_reviews.title: Protecting My. Family
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing these items for myself and being impressed with the quality and usefulness in case of an emergency, I purchased escape tools as well as a set of battery-powered flares for each of my parents and all of the other drivers in my family. While I am grateful the tools have not been used for emergencies in the two years since they were purchased, the lights have come in handy during electricity outages and during night time activities. I am confident that, should an emergency occur, my loved ones — in each of their seven individual vehicles — will appreciate their Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about it, just buy it !
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for years in my wish list. Why I hadn't buy it before? I don't know. Maybe is something I think I will never use. But if you think about it, when you need it, you need it. So I got it. No regrets, The quality is excellent, it has the perfect weight to smash a window on an emergency and the cutter for your seatbelt. I feel more secure to have it in both of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: frankreds

customer_reviews.title: Call me paranoid, but...
customer_reviews.text: Call me paranoid, but I've seen enough TV and movies to know that if you're in a car accident the seat belt will not release and the door will not open. When this item was on a serious sale on Amazon, I couldn't resist purchasing it. The tool is very sturdy and comes with a mounting bracket. Our vehicles don't have a place for this bracket, so they are in the driver's door pocket. They come with instructions, like where to strike a car window to break it most easily. By the Grace of God may we never need to use it, but if we do, it's in the car, ready for action.
customer_reviews.author: MarkMWS

customer_reviews.title: Ability to cut through seat belt...
customer_reviews.text: Received the Emergency Escape Tool in good shape, as always prompt shipping from Amazon. I certainly hope I never need to use this tool, as it's designed to get me out of a very bad situation. However I did test the seat belt cutter and found it very difficult to use. Had to yank on the tool several times as it sort of tore through the belt. The blade doesn't seem to be very sharp and made a very ragged cut ( more like a tear ). Not sure my wife would be strong enough to to yank it through the belt. Especially if she or I were injured!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Safety equipment shouldn’t be last on priority list.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, if you’re like me and don’t mind paying for safety or life saving equipment just buy it. It’s not a hammer so think realistically, has good weight and sure it can do the job. Seatbelt cutters are a must if you have child seats! In a roll over its difficult to remove belts upside down with weight of the child on the belts. Just cut and evacuate. This tool cuts and breaks window. I bought one for each vehicle in my direct family.
customer_reviews.author: Lott Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a life saving tool!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased several of these escape tools and it was nice that they came in a set of two and they were individually wrapped so I could give each member of my family one of the tools as a gift. I hope we never have to use these escape tools but they are handy to have living in Florida with so much water around and like I told my family.. you might need this tool to rescue a animal or child from a hot car!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to rate something you haven't used, and hope you never do, but these appear to be very well-made so I'm reasonably confident they'll do the job if ever needed. Good bargain. The brackets are crap for mounting, but may help keep the window-breakers from damaging the inside of the center consoles or glove compartments.
customer_reviews.author: DougJustDoug

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas because she has been wanting something similar to keep in her vehicle. All of the other products that I had looked at seemed kind of flimsy. This product is very sturdy and has some good weight to it. She’s not a very strong woman but she could definitely shatter a window with this. Thank you for making a product that makes me mom feel much safer in case of an emergency in her vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Check the blade before storing in your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Just like some other reviews, one of the two hammers was missing the cutting blade. The plastic was definitely on the "value end" of the durability scale, but I suspect they would still work for breaking windows at least once (hopefully that's all you'll ever need). A moderate whack with the tiny points of the metal hammer should be all it takes on tempered glass. Returned for a refund. Barely worth the effort, but it was the principle.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight and the holder is a great addition that is easy to install. We both sat in the seats with our belts on to ensure we would be able to reach them if our seat belts locked. Good thing there were two because finding a single spot we both could reach proved harder than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: 3JsMom

customer_reviews.title: One was missing a blade. The other was great
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately received one without a blade. Which makes it slightly useless. It does still have the hammer capability but without a blade it’s only half a product. The other in the pair was in perfect condition and I keep it in my glovebox at all times. I hope to never have to use it but I feel safer knowing I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value!! Very sturdy handle, sharp razor, haven’t tried the glass breaker but I trust it works as well as the razor! Overall very satisfied! Would recommend! Slightly curious what the orange dot is for, it can be removed but has no obvious use
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: It works! I had to break the large piece of tempered glass that’s left from a custom made mirror. We’ve dropped it on the concrete floor multiple times, hit it with a hammer - nothing worked. This thing did!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: seems like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These hammers are definitely on the cheaper side of things, but still seem like they will do the job. I have no way to test them though, at least not at this time... maybe if I change my windshield, they will let me test the hammer. In the end, they are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great, but where do I put it??
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how to mount this to anywhere in either of my cars with the given "mount". The Mount is perfectly flat, but nowhere in my car is flat or large enough to accommodate it. I don't use the Mount or case, I have the device stored in my lower door compartment until I am able to rig up another solution.
customer_reviews.author: Starrs

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my family
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this product actually works but I bought it because my niece's 19 yr best friend drowned in a lake because her seat belt was stuck and she could not be released. I bought this for my 18 yr old son, his girlfriend, my husband and myself and hope that we are never faced with a situation were we will have to use this tool but just incase we do I hope that it will prevent another tragedy. I only gave it 3 stars because I have not used it but 3 for a sense of safety.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Rojas

customer_reviews.title: save a friend or family members life
customer_reviews.text: these devices do save lives. i bought 10. for my kids, wife, parents and best friends. My best friend was saved by a man driving by after he had been rear ended from a semi. He broke his window out to cut the seat belt and get him out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: medinapool

customer_reviews.title: Should be in every vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: A simple but needed tool for everyone and in every vehicle. You never know what's going to happen on the road and what you'll come across. Though I hope to never have to use this, I have it in each vehicle and going to give another to a friend in her car. Accidents happen in a blink of an eye, be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: elin

customer_reviews.title: Useful to have but hope you never have to use it
customer_reviews.text: I hope I won't ever have to use this product. I keep one in the console and one in the glove compartment. Two things strike me - the bold warning about cancer causing products and the video demonstrating cutting the seatbelt when it's open. That makes no sense!
customer_reviews.author: DANO

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap...
customer_reviews.text: They feel cheap for something that you'd hope would save your life if need be. Obviously (Thankfully) I haven't needed to test these, and would like to keep it that way. But I might end up picking up a more durable feeling product.. Definitely feels like something you'd get at a 99c store and I don't think that's what I want in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I hope I never have to use them but if I do I feel confindent!
customer_reviews.author: TexasCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Better safe then sorry
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous item. Brought 2 for my cars and liked so much ordered 4 more for all my brothers and their wives and kids cars. Had others before with terrible quality; these i trust if a situation arose.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Now where is that thing?!
customer_reviews.text: A well-designed and manufactured tool. The holder, however, is somewhat flimsy. Depending on orientation of mounting, the tool can fall out. This is more concerning when considering force of impact and likelihood the tool will be displaced when you need it!
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Tool
customer_reviews.text: This definitely something you buy in hopes that you never have to use it! Lightweight but heavy enough to break a car window with the design of the metal ends. I will never use the mounting bracket but fits well in the console anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: Would need to use before submitting review.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t write a review about these unless I use them. Let’s hope no one has to use one but if they do, I’d certainly expect them to work! I think having one in every car is imperative!
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I have ever bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I have ever bought on Amazon. One of the tools did not have the blade. Absolutely zero quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Martel

customer_reviews.title: These were great. much better quality than the ones I ordered last year.
customer_reviews.text: I give these to family members as gifts, since we live in an area with so many bridge and ferry crossings. These were great. much better quality than the ones I ordered last year.
customer_reviews.author: g.g. mom of 5, wife of 1, nya to 4

customer_reviews.title: Hope to never need it-
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried them and hope I never have to- but they’re quality material and light weight. Only thing I would change is sending screws or something to actually mount it
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my newly driving teen would have one in their car and there was one for us too! Everyone should have one honestly, you just never know when you might need it. No one wants to have to use it. But its there if you need it. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive must-have for all drivers
customer_reviews.text: After having kids, automobile safety has been on my mind more than ever. We picked up this pack of escape tools, one for each vehicle, to have in the event of an accident. We wanted to be able to quickly get the kids out of their car seats & also break out of the vehicle if need be. I hope I never have to use them, but if I do, I feel confident that the design is strait-forward enough to be able to quickly grab and use without any previous "practice."
customer_reviews.author: Julienne V.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product. Untested!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of giving 5 stars without testing a product but... I haven't had the chance to break a window yet. The plastic feels cheap but it holds together just fine and seeing as this is more or less a one use thing the quality of the handle isn't too important.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel fletcher

customer_reviews.title: An emergency tool must have.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet and hope I never have to use it. So far it looks like it would do the job. This is an emergency tool so hope no one has to use it but everyone should have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sefu

customer_reviews.title: two for one, heckuva deal. I'm always on ...
customer_reviews.text: two for one, heckuva deal. I'm always on the road, and come across some really strange things. I came across this item and thought why not. I've seen people try to break car windows, often to no avail. This may just be the thing that's gonna come in handy, even it only once in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It’s big
customer_reviews.text: It has a great handle and seems to be effective. But it is HUGE. can’t really fit anywhere. We wanted to velcro it to outside of car but I seems to big I don’t think we can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have one of these in their car and it should be in the center section where your drink holder is not the glove box. remember you need to reach it in the middle of an emergency.... Like your car sinking in water.
customer_reviews.author: pdavis830

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought 11 of these, we give to all our boys, hubby, Dad’s for Christmas this year all of the guys get an annual tool), while this may not be an ‘everyday’ tool, it is great to know their families are safe one more way when driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, the delivery was prompt and the product was just as advertised. I would recommend you to all my associates.
customer_reviews.author: willie A. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Life Saving Device
customer_reviews.text: Great value for 2 of these. One in my car one in my wife's car. Nice size, easy to use, and comes with mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: MrChamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Hope that I never need to use these, but if I do I’m prepared.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pick up and the family car. I like that it clips onto a base and fits well in both vehicles. I hope that I never have to use it but I also like to be prepared. To me, having these along with a tow strap and flairs just makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bodien

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to use them. They seems sturdy. The point and the razor seem sharp though. Better to have it and not need it, than need it and not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew T.

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t had to use, but hopefully it performs as expected in an emergency.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had to use, but hopefully it performs as expected in an emergency. We have these in all of our vehicles. Arrived just as described. I think these would make for great practical gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful safety feature that you hope you never have to use. I bought Four so my family could each have One. Always better to be prepared especially with Winter here.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Brings peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hammer/seatbelt cutter as stocking stuffers for my family. Hopefully we will never have to use it, but it does bring a bit of peace of mind to know that the tool is in every family member’s vehicle should the need arise. It seems to be well made, the instructions for use easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: love it, but haven't had to use it. My brother said he has watched a few videos where this doesnt work. I hope thats not true in an emergency!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics FTW Again!
customer_reviews.text: Best deal of all offerings of this product type. Good quality and preferred style over some of the latest rounded, shorter styles.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it. There is no good way to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it. There is no good way to attach this to the car unless you are planning to use a nail or a screw.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: A must have in any vehicle !!
customer_reviews.text: This product allows you to break a window incase submerged in water for example and it allows you to cut your seat belt quickly to escape dangerous situations!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Ward

customer_reviews.title: You can get out!
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel safe. Bought 4 more for family an friends. Had a friend burn to death because power windows an locks didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrym Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Check out the helpful videos
customer_reviews.text: I lucky have not had to use this item as of yet, but now the wife and I have it our cars. And with the helpful online video, I now feel more comfortable about using it. I found the 2nd video more helpful because showed someone actually using it, and just not talking about using it.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful that I have not been in a situation where I needed to use it, but knowing it is now in my car I feel very confident. I like to prepare and I like to think of "what if" and be ready instead of being in a situation I may not know how to get out of. I am glad I got this item in my car. THANK YOU ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for all my kids cars as well as mine. Don’t know how it works yet but hope I never have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy product. Fits securely in holder and holder has plenty of mounting holes for however you want to mount it in your vehicle. Which makes sense as if you actually need it you won’t want it in your glove box or sliding around on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I got one for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price point for a life-or-death product that hopefully one will never need. I like the idea of using Velcro to secure this close to the driver. This multipurpose tool is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B. Safford

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have this
customer_reviews.text: I bought several for our adult kids and their spouses. I want everyone to have one of these in their car in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Hope I never have to use it
customer_reviews.text: I added these to my children’s and grand children’s stockings for Christmas. They all said they appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: KansasMom411

customer_reviews.title: Nice find
customer_reviews.text: Nice buy, have not used them and hopefully I won’t ever have to but it’s better to have it and not need it. Nice quality and fits in hand nicely. Easy to keep in the car
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Feeds sturdy in hand. Hopefully never have to use it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for myself and girlfriend. I haven't used it and hopefully will never have to. The build quality seems good and im confident, if needed, it'll work. Better to have one and never need it than the alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Feel solid.
customer_reviews.text: Hope they work if I ever need them. I don’t have a large console in my vehicle, so I used sticky backed Velcro and attached it to a carpeted area easily asscessible.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLips

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for stocking stuffers. Haven’t needed to use them (thankfully) but they look very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Madden

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have! My friend had one of these the night she got into a terrible accident & was able to get out of her car. That being said I bought one for the entire family!
customer_reviews.author: jackie86

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have
customer_reviews.text: I have always been freaked out by the thought of being submerged in water in my vehicle and NOT being able to get out, especially with power windows! I NOW have the peace of mind for the whole family!!
customer_reviews.author: Doolie

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the Worst
customer_reviews.text: After taking a AAA class on safe driving, we decided to order emergency escape tools for our cars. The video was most informative and we now have two in each car, one on each side. We certainly hope to never have to use them, but feel confident they will work if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P

customer_reviews.title: Safety/peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Since I have not found myself in my car, submerged in water, I have not yet used this product. The razor seems sharp enough to cut the material of seatbelts. I hope I do not have to use this.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Just in Case
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use this, and, honestly, I hope I don't. I keep it in my car in the side door panel. It is within easy reach and is easy to remove from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Burns

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I obviously haven't tried mine out yet. And hopefully I'll never have to. But the item did come as promised and steam very sturdy and the next time I leave the house I'm going to put it in my glove compartment
customer_reviews.author: MRCenters

customer_reviews.title: Construction feels solid and provides peice of mind.
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as described and arrived when it was promised. I have one in my car but bought this two pack for my sister and my best friend for Christmas. To me it makes sense to have one just in case, it’s like carrying a spare tire. Hopefully you don’t need it but if you do you’ll be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenah

customer_reviews.title: Great Peace-of-Mind
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my door storage are in my cars, SUV and truck. So nice I bought one for each of my 4 vehicles and for my daughters cars. Hope we never have to use them but great peace of mind knowing they are there if we ever do need them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Paul

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would have more weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time for Christmas, much to my relief. I thought it would have more weight to it, but we wont know how well it works until/if an emergency arises.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma11

customer_reviews.title: Don't know at this time
customer_reviews.text: Know these kind of tools come in handy if and when needed. Bought them as stocking stuffers so not sure how they work other then watching video to see how they are used.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs This
customer_reviews.text: A friend’s mother was recently rescued from a burning car when someone saw a tool similar to this in the door pocket and was able to cut her seatbelt. This tool also breaks windows if trapped. I bought one for my children, husband and me to keep in our cars. A small price to pay for safety.
customer_reviews.author: GreenLiz

customer_reviews.title: Just In Case
customer_reviews.text: Hope I never have to use in an emergency, but I purchased these for our cars...just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Layvba

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: This is good tool to have for emergencies. I bought two, one for my POV and the other for my patrol car it came in handy on many occasions while working accidents where the only option was to shatter the glass.
customer_reviews.author: FRENCHY

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use it said no one ever.

customer_reviews.title: Hope I wont need them
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 2 pack. Hope to never need them but they will definitely work if I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for your product! I live in Tucson ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your product! I live in Tucson, AZ, it is beyond hot in the Summer. I purchased these because every Summer children die in cars in our city. I also gave one to my Son who works in Crisis Management out on our streets. Believe me both of us would use this after calling 911 in a heartbeat. Even for a pet.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Machamer

customer_reviews.title: While they seem really light in weight and construction they fee pretty solid.
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to smash any windows to test these but will give them 5 'benefit of the doubt" stars. While they seem really light in weight and construction they fee pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: TexasFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is more important than safety!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have these (I ordered 2), I feel safer in my vehicle. I live in the Midwest and the roads get slippery in the winter. Knowing I have these gives me peace of mind while traveling .

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for both of our vehicles for our emergency tool kit - easy to use and hold.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one in their car
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this. Always concerned that I couldn't escape my car in an emergency. Gave one to my son too. Good video. Surprised the seatbelt cutter demonstrated in the video didn't operate more smoothly but better than not having it.

product_meta.title: BlueSkyBos Value 2 Pack - Emergency Escape Tool Auto Car Window Glass Hammer Breaker and Seat Belt Cutter Escape 2-in-1 Tool
product_meta.description:
A peace of mind safety tool for escaping your vehicle in case of emergency 

First of all, we, the sellers, also commercial licensed drivers and professional driving instructors, hope you will never never need to use this tool. So please drive safely. But imagine you or someone get trapped in a vehicle that is sinking to water, rolling over, or on fire, the powered windows are not functioning, or the seat belt cannot be released. This essential tool can ASSIST you or help others to escape. With a tiny fraction of your auto insurance, it can make a big difference between life and death.

Compact and lightweight, only 7.5"L x 3"W x 1.5"H, 5 ounces, easy to fit in glove box, central console, or door pocket. A plastic holder is included for convenient mounting. Our hammer is in high quality and proven to work but our price is less than many on the market. Once your item is delivered, you may use the link printed on the package to watch our live product testing video. You will see how the hammer works and learn how to use it with confidence in an emergency. 

Highly recommended by firefighters, rescue workers, and AAA. In fact, many our customers bought one for each of their vehicles by considering this recommendation.

Each hammer is in a nice protected blister pack, making it a perfect gift for your loved ones, and yourself. Click "Add to Cart" get one now, 

We provide life time warranty. Contact seller directly for replacement details. Or if for any reason you are not satisfied with the item, simply return it for a full refund or exchange. No questions asked. 

For easy accessibility, please unwrap the package and place the hammer to a convenient location of your car. Consult a certified technician before using screws to install this hammer as it may damage your vehicle’s electrical wiring.
feature_bullets: A must-have emergency lifesaving tool can make a huge difference between life and death, and should be in every vehicle.
Use it in case you are trapped in a vehicle that is sinking to water, rolling over, or on fire.
If the powered windows are not functioning during an emergency, use the double-sided, steel strike point to break the side window glass (not windshield).
If the seat belt cannot be released, use the protected razor-sharp blade to cut through the seat belt, then free trapped driver and passengers.
Compact, lightweight, proven to work, easy to fit in glove box, center armrest console, or door pocket. Each hammer is in an individual nice package, ideal gift for all occasions.
